a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Liver cancer incidence rate by risk factor, World
Estimated number of new liver cancer cases per 100,000 people attributed to each risk factor, in a given year.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
Note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is age-standardized.
